frontmatter.title: PlayTime Mobile App
frontmatter.description: Help working parents work collaboratively to keep their children busy and happy with playgroup sessions during school holidays

`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:`It is very hard for working parents to keep their children busy during school

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Playgroup sessions are good to bring children together and have fun and socialise"}),`

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:(0,e.jsx)("a",{name:"assumptions",children:"Product Goal"})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`Help working parents work collaboratively to keep their children busy and happy

`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:`Working parents find other parents to look after their kids while they are at work,
especially during school holidays`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Working parents can also look after other parent\u2019s children in return"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:`Parents can welcome children to their house in order to keep their children
socialised and improve their children's social skills`}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"Five User Stories"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 1 : Create a Playgroup"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a parent who has some time to spend with children, I want to create a playgroup session depending
on my availability, so that my kids can play with other kids at our house and socialise during school
holidays`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 2 : List Playgroups"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a PlayTime app user, I want to see the playgroup sessions with vacancy, so that I can make bookings for my
daughter and I don\u2019t need to take a day off from work`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 3 : Join a Playgroup"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a working parent using PlayTime app, I want my children to join a playgroup session created by other
parents, so that I can leave my kids to people I know and let my children have good time under their
supervision`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 4 : Cancel/Reschedule a Playgroup"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a parent who has created a playgroup session on Playtime app, I can only reschedule or cancel the playgroup
session more than 4 hours before the start of the session, so that the other parents can organise their days
accordingly`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"USER STORY 5 : Send notification to user when a new playgroup is created"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`As a working parent, I want to know the playgroup vacancies as soon they are created so that I can book my kid\u2019s
place in the playgroup before anyone else`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"Assumptions"}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:`The user is asked about their residential state when they sign up, so the application provides school holiday calendar for the
given state`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The Calendar shows only the Playground sessions within 2km to the school area which have vacancy"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The application doesn\u2019t allow a user to supervise more than 6 children for a playgroup"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"Since the product will be available only in Australia, only English language is supported."}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The app shows the current or next closest Term\u2019s School Holidays calendar by default"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:`The app also works when no network is available to check the playgroup session from the last online usage. But the user can
create or join a session when he/she is online.`}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The app can also be opened when no network is available"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The app provides two 4-hour playgroup sessions a day by default:"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"08:30 - 12:30 - morning session"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"13:00 - 17:00 - afternoon session"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The user is only allowed to reserve 4-hour-sessions, not less"}),`
`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"User Story 1 / Create Playground"}),`

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"Acceptance Criteria"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h3,{children:"Acceptance Criteria 1 : Create Playgroup"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{className:"language-gherkin",children:`Given the user signs in PlayTime App
    And is on \u201CCalendar\u201D screen
When the user clicks on \u201CCreate\u201D button
Then the user is redirected to the \u201CCreate Playgroup\u201D screen to fill the details
    And current day is selected
    And organiser is set as \u201Cme\u201D and shows user\u2019s profile picture
    And location is pre-populated with the home address of current user by default and it is enabled
    And the telephone number field is pre-populated with user\u2019s mobile number and it is disabled
    And the number of children is set to 1 and enabled
`})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h3,{children:"Acceptance Criteria 2 : Select Phone Number"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{className:"language-gherkin",children:`Given the user signs in PlayTime App
    And is on \u201CCalendar\u201D screen
When the user clicks on a day from the \u201CCalendar\u201D screen
    And clicks on \u201CCreate\u201D button
Then the user is redirected to the \u201CCreate Playgroup\u201D screen to fill the details
    And current day is selected
    And organiser is set as \u201Cme\u201D and shows user\u2019s profile picture
    And location is pre-populated with the home address of current user by default and it is enabled
    And the telephone number field is pre-populated with user's mobile number and it is disabled and the number of participant is filled with \u201CPlease select\u201D and enabled
`})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h3,{children:"Acceptance Criteria 3 : Create Playgroup / Shows a confirmation"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{className:"language-gherkin",children:`Given the user signs in PlayTime App
    And the user has selected the day
    And is on \u201CCreate Playgroup\u201D screen,
When the user selects the time of the session as \u201C8:30-12:30\u201D
    And leaves the location with default value
    And selects the number of the participants as 4
    And the user clicks on \u201CCreate\u201D button
Then the system shows a confirmation dialog asking if the user confirms to create a playgroup with the given parameters
(day, time, location, number of participants)
`})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h3,{children:"Acceptance Criteria 4 : Create Playgroup / Field error messages"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{className:"language-gherkin",children:`Given the user signs in PlayTime App
    And the user has selected the day
    And is on \u201CCreate Playgroup\u201D screen,
When user doesn\u2019t select the time and the number of participants
    And user clicks on \u201CCreate\u201D button
Then Text Field Error messages appear for time and number of participant fields on \u201CCreate Playgroup\u201D screen
`})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h3,{children:"Acceptance Criteria 5 : Create Playgroup / And notification sends"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{className:"language-gherkin",children:`Given the user signs in PlayTime App
    And the user has selected the day
    And is on \u201CCreate Playgroup\u201D screen,
When user selects time slot
    And location is set as user\u2019s home address
    And user selects the number of the participants as 4
    And user clicks on \u201CCreate\u201D button
Then the system creates a new playgroup session
    And a \u201CPlaygroup is Created\u201D Info message is shown to the user on the \u201CPlaygroup Session\u201D screen
    And the system sends a notification to other users about this new playgroup
`})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"User Story 3 / Join a playgroup"}),`

`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The average number of online application sessions per user per week or per day"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:"The average duration of a session on application"}),`

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h2,{children:"Acceptance Criteria"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h3,{children:"Acceptance Criteria 1 : Join A Playgroup / Participants alert message"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{children:`GIVEN the user has selected a playgroup with vacancy from the Calendar
    AND the user is on a Join Playgroup screen for that selected playgroup
WHEN the user clicks on \u201CJoin\u201D
THEN the system shows an Alert message next to number of participant field saying that the user has to select the number of
participants
`})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h3,{children:"Acceptance Criteria 2 : Join A Playgroup / Select number of participants"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.pre,{children:(0,e.jsx)(n.code,{children:`GIVEN the user is on a Join Playgroup screen
WHEN user selects 1 from the Number of Participants drop down
    AND clicks on \u201CJoin\u201D
THEN the system adds the user to the participants of this playgroup
    AND the number of available slots for this playgroup is decreased by 1.
`})}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"Groups And Individuals To Contact For User Stories"}),`

`,(0,e.jsx)(n.h1,{children:"Prioritization Logic"}),`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.p,{children:`The app predominately aims to provide a shared calendar between users so that they can create a playgroup or
join an existing one.`}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.ul,{children:[`
`,(0,e.jsx)(n.li,{children:`In terms of practicality and a better error prevention, users should be given enough flexibility to make a change
and contact each other, for MVP only telephone numbers of users are provided, in following sprints on-product
messaging and chat rooms will be added.`}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:["The most important feature is selected as ",(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 1 - CREATE A PLAYGROUP SESSION"}),` due to the fact that
nobody can join a session without knowing who has some availability to spend with children. To understand how
interested people are in this application, without any further investment the MVP version can even just start with
just providing the organiser's telephone number and letting them call each other and arrange booking outside the
app.`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 2 - LIST PLAYGROUP"})," is one of the important features letting the users to discover and find playgroups"]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 4 - CANCEL/RESCHEDULE PLAYGROUP"}),` is especially for error prevention letting the playgroup organiser
to take action when something urgent happens and let the other parents change their plans`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 3 - JOIN A PLAYGROUP"}),` connecting the parents without needing to make a phone call and let them
arrange their time with a single click. This comes after USER STORY 2 in list, because this requires first to find the
available playgroup that matches with a parent time schedule and then joining a session. This can be broaden with
a Request to join-Approve/Reject feature in the next releases`]}),`
`,(0,e.jsxs)(n.li,{children:[(0,e.jsx)(n.strong,{children:"USER STORY 5 - NOTIFY USERS WHEN A NEW PLAYGROUP IS CREATED"}),` aims better retention rate, informing
users of new playgroup sessions and let them come back to product more often`]}),`
`]}),`
